annotation.spannedText: It was good for children to catch diseases naturally and fight them off by themselves

classMention.mentionClass: It was good for children to catch diseases naturally and fight them off by themselves

annotation.spannedText: My baby would build up a strong immune system all of her own, not have it interfered with by some paranoid government programme that seemed to involve pumping metals into her blood

classMention.mentionClass: My baby would build up a strong immune system all of her own, not have it interfered with by some paranoid government programme that seemed to involve pumping metals into her blood

annotation.spannedText: The reason it wasn't our reality was, of course, due to a continuous programme of immunisation

classMention.mentionClass: The reason it wasn't our reality was, of course, due to a continuous programme of immunisation

annotation.spannedText: My daughter won't have to go to her friends' funerals like I did – as long as we keep giving them the jabs

classMention.mentionClass: My daughter won't have to go to her friends' funerals like I did – as long as we keep giving them the jabs

annotation.spannedText: yet some of us are still coasting on herd immunity provided by other children, which is no longer enough, because of the growing number of people like me

classMention.mentionClass: yet some of us are still coasting on herd immunity provided by other children, which is no longer enough, because of the growing number of people like me
